title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with a built-in model registry and CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, streaming, embeddings, chat, vision.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use local models as LLM, chat, or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub-Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma for question-answering over PDFs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed API, async tokio support, embeddings, chat.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming, chat, embeddings, vision.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama models as chat endpoints with admin UI and rate limiting.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper exposing extra endpoints (batch, concurrency limiting) over Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete using Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript client; zero dependencies, ESM & CJS builds.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client; supports 3.8+, async, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Subreddit for Ollama users; model tips, troubleshooting, showcase integrations.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama v0.1.40 release with vision model support.

title: ollama-youtube
summary: Tutorial: Building a private ChatGPT clone with Ollama and Next.js in 15 minutes.
